story:
iPad Mini for your Generosity & Support

Be heard, meet new people, and let the world hear what you are thinking. Imagine one million people listening to you. We all want to be heard. Have you ever had a project or idea that you wanted to share with a lot of people? What if you could share your message or idea with one million people? Could you benefit from that? Could they? Imagine having one million friends without having to send one million friend requests. Get noticed, publish yourself, and share your thoughts with the world. Get your 15 minutes of fame online!

An EXTREMELY simple way to attract online visitor’s right to ANY link on the internet to get MASSIVE exposure, Our 100% automated sends REAL visitors to your link with minimal effort.

According to experts, the average conversion rate of sales in relation to visits to sites is only 3%. However, imagine 3% of 1,000,000 visits, which equals 30,000 pchases.

SY-Link SOFTWARE DETAILS

When purchasing the software you will have unlimited access to promote as many links as you would like. This means you can create a new promotional list at any time. You have a back office dashboard in your profile to track the progress of your links. You will have access to the Mobile Marketing software inside the site, which allows you to promote your link via text messaging. Send massive Group Text Messaging campaigns promoting your links. This is the future of marketing at your fingertips.

Once you have helped us complete the SY-Link software it will retail for $30 to the general public. The system is designed so that YOU make money by sharing. Share the system with at least 10 people who will use the software to help promote their own: YouTube channel, Facebook, Resume, Website, Amazon, EBay, Craigslist ad, anything online. By promoting your site you will be promoting 5 other sites that will in turn pay you $3 for each new person you invited who use the SY-Link Software.

GROUP TEXT MESSAGING SOFTWARE

Group text messaging is integrated with the SY-Link software. Inside your profile page you will have the ability to share your link via text. You will have the ability to upload your contact list through CSV, Excel or login with your Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo, Gmail, etc. and sync your contacts in your dashboard. With just a few clicks share your link with hundreds of friends and friends of friends.

How Does It Work?

Once you complete your registration on the site, the SY-Link software will send you your new Members link to your email or mobile phone of your choice. This will help you to share it as quickly as possible, with as many people as possible with hardly any effort.

To attract 1,000,000 or more visitors you will share your link with at least 10 people that also do the same. Use the number 10 as a goal that every person must meet, but there is NO LIMIT to the number people you can share this with, which means an UNLIMITED amount of money can be made.

Reminder: The more people you share your link with, the greater the projections of hits on your site.

Your link will be placed on the first position of your new list of links along with five others underneath you. You share with ten persons who will use the software, and on their list you will be in position two. Those ten people you invited share with ten people, who multiply to one hundred and now your link is on their list in position three. The process continues all the way down to six levels of sharing, reaching one million visitors to your link. Then you are out of the list, completing the cycle, to do it again.

*The video explains in detail the sign up process for new members.

SIMULATION

What We Need & What You Get

$50,000 is being raised to finish the final stages of the software and website. You will receive monthly updates via email or text (your choice) on the softwares progress and completion. This website is extremely unique, and different, and does not exist, so we have hired a company (Integrated Web Works) to complete the final stages of the site and software. This website and software will give every online user an easy and very inexpensive way to promote their very own links. 

This service is truly for the people! You will be doing a great service and be helping millions of people; working from home, starting a new business, submitting resumes to get a job, or just wanting to be heard. We have been working for over 11 months on this website and software with NO pay. We believe in helping an making a difference in our community. We hope you will come with us on this journey. Be a part of a new way to be heard online.

We are giving away some really great gifts with the Perks you buy. We wanted to give everyone whom helps and supports us, the opportunity to get the latest technology available from Apple and Samsung. These devices will help you Share your links the easiest and fastest way possible. We are also offering some products that you probably never even knew existed and aren't even available in stores yet. So, “Pre-Order Today”. Take advantage of the perks and gifts while they are still available. The gifts will be sent to you before the software or site is completed. You will receive the gifts before the Christmas, so you can scratch it off your Santa list or re-gift it to family or friend, all while helping us.

ALL funds collected (even if exceeded) will go towards the development and final design of the software and site. The more money that is raised, the faster the software can be completed and the more features can be offered for its users on the website. Help us raise One Million Dollars, and we will have enough money to hire and pay employees. We would LOVE to really help stimulate our economy and create more jobs... but we need your help. Your spare change can change lives. Thank You!!!

How You Can Help

Everyone can HELP, This is HOW

  • Please get the word out and make some NOISE for this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, to share the link!

LIFETIME MEMBER - BUTTON               AFFILIATE - HOODY

SPONSOR - WATCH

SUPERVISOR - SOLAR CHARGER

MANAGER - iPAD CONVERT

MANAGER - POCKET PROJECTOR

BOARD MEMBER - SAMSUNG TABLET

BOARD MEMBER - iPAD MINI

DIRECTOR - iPHONE 5

PARTNER - NEW iPAD

 

PARTNER - MAC BOOK PRO 

 

CoFOUNDER - iMAC TOUCHSCREEN
story_txt:
iPad Mini for your Generosity & Support

Be heard, meet new people, and let the world hear what you are thinking. Imagine one million people listening to you. We all want to be heard. Have you ever had a project or idea that you wanted to share with a lot of people? What if you could share your message or idea with one million people? Could you benefit from that? Could they? Imagine having one million friends without having to send one million friend requests. Get noticed, publish yourself, and share your thoughts with the world. Get your 15 minutes of fame online!
An EXTREMELY simple way to attract online visitor’s right to ANY link on the internet to get MASSIVE exposure, Our 100% automated sends REAL visitors to your link with minimal effort.
According to experts, the average conversion rate of sales in relation to visits to sites is only 3%. However, imagine 3% of 1,000,000 visits, which equals 30,000 pchases.
SY-Link SOFTWARE DETAILS
When purchasing the software you will have unlimited access to promote as many links as you would like. This means you can create a new promotional list at any time. You have a back office dashboard in your profile to track the progress of your links. You will have access to the Mobile Marketing software inside the site, which allows you to promote your link via text messaging. Send massive Group Text Messaging campaigns promoting your links. This is the future of marketing at your fingertips.
Once you have helped us complete the SY-Link software it will retail for $30 to the general public. The system is designed so that YOU make money by sharing. Share the system with at least 10 people who will use the software to help promote their own: YouTube channel, Facebook, Resume, Website, Amazon, EBay, Craigslist ad, anything online. By promoting your site you will be promoting 5 other sites that will in turn pay you $3 for each new person you invited who use the SY-Link Software.
GROUP TEXT MESSAGING SOFTWARE
Group text messaging is integrated with the SY-Link software. Inside your profile page you will have the ability to share your link via text. You will have the ability to upload your contact list through CSV, Excel or login with your Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo, Gmail, etc. and sync your contacts in your dashboard. With just a few clicks share your link with hundreds of friends and friends of friends.
How Does It Work?
Once you complete your registration on the site, the SY-Link software will send you your new Members link to your email or mobile phone of your choice. This will help you to share it as quickly as possible, with as many people as possible with hardly any effort.
To attract 1,000,000 or more visitors you will share your link with at least 10 people that also do the same. Use the number 10 as a goal that every person must meet, but there is NO LIMIT to the number people you can share this with, which means an UNLIMITED amount of money can be made.

Reminder: The more people you share your link with, the greater the projections of hits on your site.

Your link will be placed on the first position of your new list of links along with five others underneath you. You share with ten persons who will use the software, and on their list you will be in position two. Those ten people you invited share with ten people, who multiply to one hundred and now your link is on their list in position three. The process continues all the way down to six levels of sharing, reaching one million visitors to your link. Then you are out of the list, completing the cycle, to do it again.
*The video explains in detail the sign up process for new members.
SIMULATION

What We Need & What You Get
$50,000 is being raised to finish the final stages of the software and website. You will receive monthly updates via email or text (your choice) on the softwares progress and completion. This website is extremely unique, and different, and does not exist, so we have hired a company (Integrated Web Works) to complete the final stages of the site and software. This website and software will give every online user an easy and very inexpensive way to promote their very own links. 
This service is truly for the people! You will be doing a great service and be helping millions of people; working from home, starting a new business, submitting resumes to get a job, or just wanting to be heard. We have been working for over 11 months on this website and software with NO pay. We believe in helping an making a difference in our community. We hope you will come with us on this journey. Be a part of a new way to be heard online.
We are giving away some really great gifts with the Perks you buy. We wanted to give everyone whom helps and supports us, the opportunity to get the latest technology available from Apple and Samsung. These devices will help you Share your links the easiest and fastest way possible. We are also offering some products that you probably never even knew existed and aren't even available in stores yet. So, “Pre-Order Today”. Take advantage of the perks and gifts while they are still available. The gifts will be sent to you before the software or site is completed. You will receive the gifts before the Christmas, so you can scratch it off your Santa list or re-gift it to family or friend, all while helping us.
ALL funds collected (even if exceeded) will go towards the development and final design of the software and site. The more money that is raised, the faster the software can be completed and the more features can be offered for its users on the website. Help us raise One Million Dollars, and we will have enough money to hire and pay employees. We would LOVE to really help stimulate our economy and create more jobs... but we need your help. Your spare change can change lives. Thank You!!!
How You Can Help
Everyone can HELP, This is HOW

Please get the word out and make some NOISE for this campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools, to share the link!
LIFETIME MEMBER - BUTTON               AFFILIATE - HOODY

SPONSOR - WATCH

SUPERVISOR - SOLAR CHARGER

MANAGER - iPAD CONVERT

MANAGER - POCKET PROJECTOR

BOARD MEMBER - SAMSUNG TABLET
BOARD MEMBER - iPAD MINI

DIRECTOR - iPHONE 5

PARTNER - NEW iPAD

 
PARTNER - MAC BOOK PRO 
 

CoFOUNDER - iMAC TOUCHSCREEN

story:
The Short of it... 

Help! There's a shortage of affordable wellness studios in New York City; even in Northern Manhattan's Washington Heights/Inwood community!

For the past 1.5 years, we've been running a $45 a month unlimited classes studio out of JourneySpace founder's apartment. We were 5 passionate, dedicated instructors teaching Yoga, Zumba Fitness, Ballet Barre, and JourneyDance and we want to keep this going and growing. 

But we can no longer use the existing space. So we desperately need a new home and that's where you come in.

What We Need

Our dream is to raise $10,000. This would cover a few months of operating expenses (rent, salaries, insurance, marketing, etc.) in a shared space which has already been secured! Should we fail to raise the full $10,000, but raise enough for at least one month of expenses, we will commence with classes October 27 or November 3rd. We will have from now until December 1 to enroll approximately 30 members for the studio to sustain itself. 

What if We Fail?

Oh no! That would never happen. But some folks have asked what would happen to donations if we fail to find space or decide not to reopen. All donations would be refunded. $500 level donors may opt out of a refund if they wish to keep their artwork, valued at $800 and above.

Where will JourneySpace be Located?

We found a lovely shared space on 190th & Bennett Avenue, only steps from both the "A" and "#1" train, Broadway & Fort Washington busses M4, M98, M100, Bx7.

Why is JourneySpace so Important?

JourneySpace membership is as low as $45 per month for 4 classes per month and $70 per month for unlimited classes including Vinyasa Yoga, Zumba, Ballet Barre, and JourneyDance. We charge 50-60% less than other studios in the area because we believe that wellness should be accessible to everyone! Plus we offer...

  • A small community of down-to-earth, nonjudgmental, like-minded, and devoted members who have attended classes for the past 1.5 years.
  • Knowledgable teachers who absolutely love to teach and care deeply about their students.
  • Affordable Life Coaching offered to JourneySpace members, some of whom have reported and exhibit tremendous personal growth.
What participants have to say...
"I am in love with the Ballet that Maggie is teaching. She is such an effective, inspired, patient teacher that I just glow after each class. I learn technique and proper form and get to understand the reason and idea behind each movement. I watch her graceful dancing and get inspired! Thank you Maggie for this experience, it adds a new dimension to my dancing."  —SK, JourneySpace Member
“…I am so, so, so grateful for places like JourneySpace and people like Annabella Cruz and Maggie Hernandez for gifting me this physical and deeeeeeply spiritual practice of love, liberation, connection, power. there are so few safe cocoons in which i can practice simply BEING, without having to shield myself from the micro-aggressions directed towards my skin, my body, my mother tongue. you’ve been my medicine and shelter through the storm. just…. thank you. #blessed #transformed #oneyearanniversary #thejourneycontinues” — AR, JourneySpace Member
“For the past few months I’ve allowed a lot of the outside world to take up space in my life that had no business being there! My first time doing Journey Dance was so emotionally charged and such a moving experience that I went home feeling emotionally 50 lbs lighter!!! I released thru tears and a self expression that I’ve never experienced before. My instructor was extremely well versed in her field and was able to guide me to ‘let go’ without feeling self-conscious or afraid! This is definitely an ‘activity’ that I will be incorporating into my life! Life is too short to carry unwanted baggage!”  — JourneyDance Participant

“…Journey dance brought up a lot of thoughts that were stuck in my subconscious. My dreams were very busy last night, but, they were pretty relevant to the things which I so direly need to express to those closest to me. Thank you for your guidance!” — JourneyDance Participant

“Ahhh, I love the drumming. Total bliss!” — Wellness Drumming Participant 

“I think you started me on a nice path… Today I let go of all anger, jealousy, bitterness and resentment. I permanently delete them from my mind, body, and life for good.” — Anonymous (Anonymous Coaching Client)

“The Life Strategies Workshop is most definitely beneficial to those who feel stuck in their lives. It gives you a chance to reevaluate WHY you are not succeeding, why you are not happy with life and why you don’t LOVE yourself enough. The tools provided by JourneyWellness are doses of empowerment for life. Cheers to Maggie Hernandez-Knight & her Workshops!” — T.V. (Life Strategies Workshop participant)

“Before taking the [Life Strategies] course I pretty much lost my identitiy. This was conveyed to potential employers who were doubtful of my capabilities. While taking the course, I was able to re-identify myself, understand the things that made me happy. Further interviews with employers got a good sense of myself and ideals which were in line with theirs. I landed a good job which will enable me to further seek my balance in life and plan.” — Gayle (Life Strategies Workshop participant)

The Founder & Director


Maggie Hernandez-Knight, is a dedicated Wellness Facilitator employing Life & Health Coaching and Transformational Arts to help others live happier, healthier lives. This came after having overcome her own life-long challenges including depression, deep rooted fears and anger. Maggie has been sharing her experience since 2002 in hopes of awakening others to the magic of self-empowerment and healing. In 2008 she developed the “MOS Life Strategies Plan” which is employed with groups and private clients as a tool for self assessing and correcting deficiencies in their lives. She is also a passionate speaker who communicates powerfully and listens attentively with both her ears and her heart. Maggie holds certifications as a Burris Life Coach, L.E.A.N. Health Coach, Transformational Rhythm Facilitator, Laughter Yoga Leader and JourneyDance Guide. She is also the author of the book, The Magic of Succeeding: Baby-Stepping Your Thoughts, Goals, and Life.

  • Personal Development Author
  • BurrisTM Life Coach
  • L.E.A.N. Health Coach
  • JourneyDanceTM Instructor
  • Wellness Drumming Facilitator
  • Visual Artist
  • Ballet Teacher
  • Laughter YogaTM Leader

About her conviction...

I am a local inner-city gal with determination and 30+ years of business experience. I spent a near fortune many years ago healing myself through yoga, wellness workshops, therapy, etc. I did so because I was desperate to change my life. And now, I see people in my own community without the means to access the services that saved me. So, I decided to do something about it! 

Without a trust fund, it is nearly impossible, so it seems, to get this dream off the ground. But what kind of example would I be to my coaching clients if I didn't find a solution and go for it no matter the outcome! With that said, I will have to make the big push and make this happen for them and for me. And it wouldn't be the first time. 

  • When I decided I would become a "ballerina" at age 9, I did it,
  • When I decided to enter the corporate arena at age 18, I did it.
  • When I decided becoming the youngest assistant supervisor in a private bank was important, I did it.
  • When I decided to learn to paint and become an artist, I did it.
  • When I decided to invent and make a game, I did it.
  • When I decided to write and produce a play for kids, I did it.
  • When I decided to heal old emotional wounds and grow, I did it.
  • When I decided to publish a book about healing, I did it.
  • When I decided to get trained and start a coaching practice, I did it.
  • When I decided to open JourneySpace, I did it.
And now, I want to add to my list...

  • When I decided to take JourneySpace out of my apartment and into a commercial space, I did it!

— Maggie Hernandez-Knight 


Think You Can't Afford to Contribute?

Have you ever given a homeless person the last $20 in your wallet and come to find you didn't miss it anyway? Consider giving whatever amount you think you wouldn't miss. The collective "last bill in your wallet", can go a long way. And if you're still not comfortable giving financially, here's how else you can support this cause: 

  • Like our Facebook page.
  • Share the campaign on your social networks with the links provided on the campaign page. 
  • Spread the word about our campaign. 
  • Tell your family and friends why you believe in our mission.
  • Join our mailing list.

Thank You for Your Support!

story:
Connecting young adults to community service and Jewish spirituality during their year in Israel

Livnot U'Lehibanot was founded in 1980 to bridge the gap between volunteering and learning programs; to provide meaningful service opportunities and Jewish content in an open-minded coed environment. Thanks to support from alumni and friends of Livnot, these programs are subsidized to allow students and young professionals the chance for an impactful Israel experience. Participants build up the land and people of Israel while forging meaningful connections to their heritage and identity with like-minded peers:

  • Contributing to the people of Israel in an under-served periphery area.
  • Building parks, bringing cheer to the elderly and immigrant populations of Tzfat, play therapy at the child development center, and restoring ancient ruins are a partial sampling of the projects we work on.
  • Hiking the Land of Israel while learning Jewish values from nature.

What We Need & What You Get

  • It costs participants $150, which includes housing, meals, learning sessions, and materials for service projects. We need to raise the rest to keep the program affordable and continue building up this northern Israel community.
  • Cool, personal perks--mystical art from Tzfat, shout-out, a personal song from the L'Office, and more--starting at the $5 donation level.
  • The amount we're raising in this campaign will provide scholarships to 20 participants for the week-long Sukkot program. Every $500 subsidizes one volunteer, who will have a life-changing experience of helping others while on a journey of spiritual exploration.

The Impact

Livnot is an empowering program...but don't just take our word for it:

  • "I do feel that I contributed and gave back to the community significantly, I received a feeling of being needed and fulfillment that I’ve done something worthwhile." -M.S., New Jersey
  • "Some of my best memories from my Livnot program include building a playground in a local children’s hospital, meditating in the forest at night, and dancing in the streets of Tzfat on Simchat Torah. What makes Livnot unique is that it is gives Jewish adults with little to no Jewish background a place to explore their Jewish heritage through spirituality workshops with topics ranging from tikkun olam to love and relationships. The Sukkot program gives participants a chance to trek through Golan Waterfalls, and explore Jewish spirituality through nature." -Z.S., Florida
  • "I liked being close to nature, being close to animals and plants, and people who had a can-do attitude. I received more confidence in my wish to connect to nature." -S.W., New Jersey

Challenges

Livnot is a non-profit organization that has been operating Israel experience programs for 34 years. Because we are not affiliated with any particular denomination or stream of Judaism, and offer such a broad array of activities that we don't fit into one "funding box," we work extra hard to ensure that programs can continue. Livnot's programs are unique and inspiring. With your help, we can keep them going for many more decades!

    Other Ways You Can Get Involved

    Just because you can't contribute financially, doesn't mean that you can't help!

    • Make some noise! Use the social sharing tools to get the word out to your family, friends, and neighbors about supporting this cause.
    • Do you know a good candidate for the program? Get them to sign up and join for an amazing week in Tzfat! With Livnot's new campus extension, we have room for more participants than ever before!

    Got questions? Feel free to contact us.  :)

story:
Bay of Fungi is a campaign that will help us empower others to cultivate their own mushrooms. Your support will enable us to bring our 'Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushroom Kit' to life, as well as support the creation of our lab. These two aspects of our campaign will mean that folks far and wide will be able to explore growing gourmet mushrooms. 


We are Gavin, Nick and Ashley. We are Bay of Fungi. And we love mushrooms! 

    

Our journey with Bay of Fungi began with a simple intention - to learn to grow gourmet mushrooms to feed our families. We knew of the incredible health benefits and nutrient content of gourmet mushrooms but, in reality, we couldn't afford to keep our fridges stocked! Our experience was that the gourmet mushrooms we loved - primarily shiitake, oyster and reishi - were either completely out of our price range or simply not available where we lived. 

And so our journey began - in our tiny kitchen with a gift pressure cooker and a bag full of Oyster mushroom spawn! 

               

                                home grown blue oyster & shiitake mushrooms

     

                                    

As we began to experience success with home-scale mushroom cultivation our dream expanded to include providing affordable, sustainable gourmet mushrooms to our community. To realize this dream, we have spent the last 6 months building an off-grid mushroom farm located in Sackville, NB. Using energy from the sun we heat our farm, we pump our water, we cool our fridge and we grow our mushrooms! 

               

     

                         October 2015                                                        October 2015                                                         

                  

                                                                  January 2016      

We now have the capacity to provide local, affordable and sustainable gourmet mushrooms to our community...and beyond! Through our campaign we invite you to be a part of this journey of creation, share in the joy of growing your own mushrooms and experience the satisfaction of producing a nutritionally dense, delicious tasting food right from the comfort of your own home! 


What We Need .....


We are hoping to raise $9000.00. These funds will help us in two ways;

We will use the first $5000 to bring our 'Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushroom Kits' to life.

This $5000 will help us cover the costs of packaging, filter patch bags, and paying our magnificent designer who has helped us turn a possibility into reality. 

Secondly, we will send the remaining $4000.00 right into the creation of our lab. 

Over the years we've been able to source and build some amazing equipment to support the lab of our dreams. This funding will help us complete the final push with this space which includes  finishing touches on our equipment, siding, plumbing, implements to hook our equipment to our solar grid and the odds and ends of running a lab (glass petri dishes, scalpels, etc.). 

                               

                                                   ..... & What You Get


Bay of Fungi is a straightforward campaign with a quick turn around time! You can expect to receive your PERK within 40 days of the campaign completion. 


               Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushrooms - Kitchen Grow Kit

           

For supporting our initiative you will receive our brand new 'Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushrooms - Kitchen Grow Kit'. With this grow kit you will have the opportunity to grow up to 3lbs of delicious Blue Oyster Mushrooms. 

Blue Oyster mushrooms are a sweet and mild flavoured mushroom. This means they are quite versatile and can be used in many ways. They taste great in stir fry, on pizza, in soup, with meat, and so on. Not only that, they are super nutritious! They are high in protein, high in vitamins (B1, B2 & folic acid) and minerals (iron, zinc & potassium).

From the time you open your kit you will likely see mushroom 'babies' within 5-7 days. This means, you will be harvesting your first batch of mushrooms within 10-12 days. Following directions you will get at least 2 harvests. For more instructions to keep your mushrooms growing please visit our website! 

                                         


Other Ways You Can Help

A message of encouragement, a share on Facebook, a tweet on Twitter, a snail in the mail...anything to help us get the word out there is so valuable. 


In gratitude, 

Gavin, Nick & Ashley 


If you'd like to learn more about our project and our vision please check out our video profile in the wonderful online series, 'The Eastern Alternative'

http://tv1.bellaliant.ca/home/ondemand/lifestyle/eastern-alternative/eastern-alternative-s1-e04
story_txt:
Bay of Fungi is a campaign that will help us empower others to cultivate their own mushrooms. Your support will enable us to bring our 'Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushroom Kit' to life, as well as support the creation of our lab. These two aspects of our campaign will mean that folks far and wide will be able to explore growing gourmet mushrooms. 

We are Gavin, Nick and Ashley. We are Bay of Fungi. And we love mushrooms! 

    

Our journey with Bay of Fungi began with a simple intention - to learn to grow gourmet mushrooms to feed our families. We knew of the incredible health benefits and nutrient content of gourmet mushrooms but, in reality, we couldn't afford to keep our fridges stocked! Our experience was that the gourmet mushrooms we loved - primarily shiitake, oyster and reishi - were either completely out of our price range or simply not available where we lived. 
And so our journey began - in our tiny kitchen with a gift pressure cooker and a bag full of Oyster mushroom spawn! 


               

                                home grown blue oyster & shiitake mushrooms
     

                                    

As we began to experience success with home-scale mushroom cultivation our dream expanded to include providing affordable, sustainable gourmet mushrooms to our community. To realize this dream, we have spent the last 6 months building an off-grid mushroom farm located in Sackville, NB. Using energy from the sun we heat our farm, we pump our water, we cool our fridge and we grow our mushrooms! 
               

                              October 2015                                                        October 2015                                                                           
                                                                  January 2016      
We now have the capacity to provide local, affordable and sustainable gourmet mushrooms to our community...and beyond! Through our campaign we invite you to be a part of this journey of creation, share in the joy of growing your own mushrooms and experience the satisfaction of producing a nutritionally dense, delicious tasting food right from the comfort of your own home! 


What We Need .....

We are hoping to raise $9000.00. These funds will help us in two ways;
We will use the first $5000 to bring our 'Grow Your Own Gourmet Mushroom Kits' to life.
This $5000 will help us cover the costs of packaging, filter patch bags, and paying our magnificent designer who has helped us turn a possibility into reality. 
Secondly, we will send the remaining $4000.00 right into the creation of our lab. 

Over the years we've been able to source and build some amazing equipment to support the lab of our dreams. This funding will help us complete the final push with this space which includes  finishing touches on our equipment, siding, plumbing, implements to hook our equipment to our solar grid and the odds and ends of running a lab (glass petri dishes, scalpels, etc.).

Blue Oyster mushrooms are a sweet and mild flavoured mushroom. This means they are quite versatile and can be used in many ways. They taste great in stir fry, on pizza, in soup, with meat, and so on. Not only that, they are super nutritious! They are high in protein, high in vitamins (B1, B2 & folic acid) and minerals (iron, zinc & potassium).
From the time you open your kit you will likely see mushroom 'babies' within 5-7 days. This means, you will be harvesting your first batch of mushrooms within 10-12 days. Following directions you will get at least 2 harvests. For more instructions to keep your mushrooms growing please visit our website!

story:
Who are the Kramers?

The Kramers are the family that is passionate enough about a favorite childhood past time to form a business around it. The adult male's name is John P. Kramer and the adult woman's name is Linsey B. Kramer. The smaller version of the man is named Avi I. Kramer and the smaller version of the woman is named Sareli C. Kramer. 
John and Linsey are the ones that loved laser tag growing up. The younger one's haven't grown up yet because they are only 3. John and Linsey hope the little ones will also be passionate about laser tag, but if they are not, John and Linsey hope that they will at least have modeled for Avi and Sareli how to pursue dreams and go for it. 

What Is Tactical Laser Tag?

The business is a mobile tactical laser tag business. Tactical laser tag uses more realistic looking weapons than traditional laser tag equipment. 

The gun above is the gun that will be used in our business. It has amazing capabilities for game play with amazing software to match. Technology has been good to laser tag in the past 3-5 years. The head sensors are comfy and wireless through blue tooth technology and the guns are connected through Wi-Fi to the main laptop which tracks game information like hits given/taken, ammo count, health, and accuracy. 
The game can be played in broad daylight or at night and hits can be given from hundreds of yards away, although that's pretty impractical. There are also many modes of play for missions. 

Laser Tag Doesn't Just Run Off Of Dream Clouds and Dolphin Smiles

                  


As a contributor to this campaign you will help the Kramers purchase necessary equipment to turn the dream into reality. 
They have the majority of funds and are ready to purchase the big ticket items like the guns and about half of the obstacles. They are still depending on laser tag enthusiasts from all over and excited Lynchburgers to send in the support for other important items such as a dedicated laptop to run the game software on, mobile wireless internet equipment, a generator, signage, table/gun stand, and the other half of the obstacles. They need about $3,500 to make it all happen. 
The more you contribute, the more free laser tag you will get! If you are not in the Lynchburg area and you contribute $40 or more the Kramers will send you a Chill Street Laser Tag t-shirt to show their thanks! If you are in Lynchburg you will get a shirt delivered in person and a big hug from everyone in the family for donating $40 or more. 
If they don't reach their goal they will  use this money to buy the laptop  and wireless equipment. If they reach beyond the goal extra donations will be put towards the other half of the obstacles which is about $500.

Sounds Good, But They Might Fail

Every startup has risks and challenges. A major pitfall in starting a new business is lack of experience and foresight. The Kramers have been consulting with their local small business development center for the past 7 months to prepare for everything that may come at them in the first 3 years of owning their business. Through this counsel they have learned to start with the bare essentials and be smart with little money and build on from there. 

Although the dream is a childhood dream, their focus, intensity, and discipline in making this business a successful one is not at all childlike. They are prepared to work hard, passionately and creatively to face the challenges ahead of them. 

Also, they aren't quitting their day jobs as public school teachers so they will keep steady income to help support Chill Street in any lulls in business (aka winter). If they quit teaching where else would they get hundreds of teacher mugs for Christmas and the occasional teacher wreath?

                                                

Help

lf you can't donate but are still excited about Chill Street coming to Lynchburg, please spread the word in person and via social media. 

If you read all of this or even skimmed over it, thank you so much!


Here is our awesome Perk Shirt.

story:
UPDATE 7/26/13: THANKS TO YOU MANY WONDERFUL CONTRIBUTORS, OUR VIDEO CAMPAIGN RAISED A TOTAL OF $72,525 IN ONLINE, OFFLINE (CASH & CHECKS) AND IN-KIND GIFTS! GEORGETOWN COUNTY HAS STEPPED IN TO LEVERAGE YOUR GENEROUS DONATIONS TO PROVIDE IN-KIND SKILLED LABOR  TO HELP US FINISH THE BUILDING. WE'LL KEEP YOU POSTED ON OUR PROGRESS VIA FACEBOOK AND OUR WEBSITE: themitneyproject.org. THANK YOU TO ALL OF OUR INDIEGOGO SUPPORTERS FOR JOINING US AND HELPING TO RESTORE HOPE AND OPPORTUNITY IN THIS COMMUNITY!

CONGRATULATIONS TO KRISTEN HUNTER OF NORTH CAROLINA WHO WON OUR REFERRAL CONTEST! TO HER WE SAY: "MUCHISIMAS GRACIAS Y BUEN VIAJE!"

 

“Mitney” is a West End word for “child.” Usually a bright -and maybe a little mischievous- child.

Our start: “If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door”

In the poorest area of Georgetown, SC, ten friends and business acquaintances started discussing ways to help less privileged kids have a better quality of life.

Their vision of rebuilding the neglected West End community became The Mitney Project.

We called a town meeting and talked to everyone we know.

Several friends stepped in to help. Many volunteered as instructors: dancers, IT teachers, bankers. The County lent us 2 rooms in an old school and we started with a dance class for 23 kids.

 

 

Then something amazing happened….

 

Dreams rekindled

Parents waiting in the halls asked for their own activity. Then a group of ten young boys came to ask if we could “give them something to do.” More people started telling us what they needed to create better lives for themselves.

So we created a homebuyer program for them. A computer class. A fitness class. Then a financial mastery class.

Some kids from a private school held a fundraiser and bought the boys a robotics kit. The arts council gave us some art supplies and asked some artists to give the kids lessons. 

 

You get the picture. 

The project grew organically, mostly thanks to friends who share their time and resources. In the past 3 years, we’ve served over 250 people and maxed out at 5 rooms in the old school.  The halls are full of the sounds music, learning and laughter.

But now we need more space.

 

A community’s heart

With 7,600 square feet, the former warehouse that will be The West End Community Center has space for more than 500.

It is smack-dab in the middle – the heart - of our community; people can walk to the building from all around.

It will have a medical office with a dedicated neighborhood physician.

There will be a community kitchen with healthy cooking classes, a dance fitness studio and film and photography studio.

Rooms where adults and kids will learn about entrepreneurship and start small with a team of mentors to help them succeed.

There will be an open multipurpose place for community gatherings, and workshops and events other community partners want to share.

A safe space for living, sharing, creating art and growing better together.  A place to find a new dream for life and spread good into the neighborhood – and beyond.

 

Sharing with the world

Helping to finish the center is how people from all over the world become a part of this process.

So many people are pulling together to make this happen:

Volunteer roofers, carpenters and plumbers.  Composer Mark Mancina who let us use his beautiful composition for our video. The donors who gave us a roof system and a ton of drywall. The funders who awarded us a $99,000 matching grant to help with construction. 

We need to raise $101,000 in a month to be awarded the money, buy construction materials, wire the building for electricity and install plumbing. This is where you come in. 

  

Your Gift: Creating possibility

We can’t do this by ourselves. For this crazy dream to become real, you’ve got to help us get the word out. Send this message to everyone you know! Be a Change Agent and make this your Mission Possible. Tweet it, Instagram it, Pinterest it, put it on Facebook, text it to the world! Let everyone know you believe as we do, that NOTHING IS IMPOSSIBLE for willing hearts uniting behind a cause that serves the greater good. 

Your gift will create a home for opportunity, a haven for creativity, a space where a depressed community reclaims its heart and is renewed.

And every gift counts, no matter the size! To reach $101,000 will take pooling together gifts in all amounts – large and small. It’s by doing what you can that this amazing project will happen.

 Plus, you get some great perks for your gift….. 

 

WE LOVE TO SAY THANK YOU!

The center will serve a community of 2000 people which means you will have the instant adoration of a legion of grateful beneficiaries the moment you make your gift.  That’s a lot of love and good vibes headed your way.

When construction is finished we’re throwing a huge party for our supporters – as many as the fire department will allow in the center (about 500). If you can’t be there in person, use your webcam to join us as we stream the party across the internet to the world. (We are so tickled that our friends in Europe and Africa will be able to join us this way!!)

And check out the more tangible ways to thank you that we’ve listed on this page.   Even if you are in another state or you’re one of our friends from across the globe, you will find a reward for your gift that helps you become part of this special community.

For gifts of $250 you get a tshirt for which you can choose a Change Agent avatar. Agent Rogue Do-gooder has killer curves and a hammer dedicated to building opportunity; Agent Z. Rightforce is mysterious in his fedora and trenchcoat; dual agents Bon and Trace with their hammer and drill are up to the challenge of rebuilding West End. Find their images on The Mitney Project's Facebook page. 

From art the kids will design especially for you, to immortalizing your name in art installations throughout the center, to a personalized book featuring elder anecdotes on creating your best life, to being able to participate in the center’s launch party via webcam, we have special ways of thanking you for joining us on this extraordinary journey.

 

So When Will This All Happen?

Very soon, actually.  The timeframe is pretty much as follows:

 

June 2013                   Raise $101,000

July 2013                     Complete construction, medical office opens

October 2013             Remaining activities spaces open

December 2013          Throw a Really Big Launch Party!!! Donor thank you’s

 

2014 and Beyond

This is the best part. Knowing the good that will come because the center will be here.

300 people seeing a doctor in their neighborhood with a wellness prescription that might include a healthy cooking class and dance fitness – all in one place! 200+ adults and kids learning 21st century skills in all kinds of activities: New entrepreneurs, young and mature, and new neighborhood businesses launched. More first-time homebuyers trained and homes with hand-made solar panels. Kids learning 21st century media skills like animation, web-design and film crew positions and how to cherish the earth by using green technology. Their parents learning new job skills and the importance of saving toward goals. 140 dilapidated structures renovated or replaced with beautiful new homes for low-income families.

The community center will host tons of activities that have never been available in this area before:

A film and photography studio – where professional filmmaker friends of ours will give workshops that teach kids how to create a storyboard for their ideas, crew and shoot a film or photo project, the editing process

A music studio – where friends we have in the industry will teach participants about producing music but also about managing artists, where our local church choirs and garage bands will be able to record the sounds of our local culture and share it with the world

A design lab – where the kids in our robotics and alternative energy activities can stretch out and dream bigger, designing real life green solutions like solar panels and learning from professionals working in cutting edge technology fields in our region

A community gathering space, where people can unwind, connect and discuss the music, art and creative pursuits that fill this space with beauty and new ideas. Where seniors can come and no longer be alone. Where youths and children have a safe place to play.

These are just the highlights of what the center you help build will make real.

A West End whose dreams have been reborn. A safe harbor for home-seekers. A warm, welcoming, wonderful place where everyone in the community – including you - can grow, create and achieve.

A place with a new opportunity behind every door.

 

REFERRAL CONTEST DETAILS:

The person who refers the greatest number of donors to this campaign page wins one week in a one-bedroom suite for him/her self and a guest in a 5-star, all-inclusive resort and spa in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico (value: $1,800). The winner will also receive a $100 airfare voucher to use toward their travel; remaining travel costs are not included in the contest prize. The week must be used between January 1, 2014 and December 31, 2014 and is non-transferable, non-refundable and may not be redeemed for cash. Once reserved, the week may not be changed for another week. See the resort and spa here: www.velasvallarta.com.

To ensure your referrals are counted correctly: 1) make a contribution to this campaign and when you receive your confirmation, note the "spread the word" url that Indiegogo provides. Insert this url into the emails you send to friends. When they click through and contribute to this campaign, your referral tally will increase.  OR 2) create an Indiegogo account for yourself (free), then use the "Share" tools on this campaign page located just below the video.

The referral contest winner will be announced by The Mitney Project on this campaign page, on Mitney's Facebook page and on Mitney's website www.themitneyproject.org on July 23. The winner will be notified directly by Mitney via email on the same day. Good luck, and thank you for helping to build an opportunity center for a great community!

A community gathering space, where people can unwind, connect and discuss the music, art and creative pursuits that fill this space with beauty and new ideas. Where seniors can come and no longer be alone. Where youths and children have a safe place to play.
These are just the highlights of what the center you help build will make real.
A West End whose dreams have been reborn. A safe harbor for home-seekers. A warm, welcoming, wonderful place where everyone in the community – including you - can grow, create and achieve.
A place with a new opportunity behind every door.
 
REFERRAL CONTEST DETAILS:
The person who refers the greatest number of donors to this campaign page wins one week in a one-bedroom suite for him/her self and a guest in a 5-star, all-inclusive resort and spa in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico (value: $1,800). The winner will also receive a $100 airfare voucher to use toward their travel; remaining travel costs are not included in the contest prize. The week must be used between January 1, 2014 and December 31, 2014 and is non-transferable, non-refundable and may not be redeemed for cash. Once reserved, the week may not be changed for another week. See the resort and spa here: www.velasvallarta.com.
To ensure your referrals are counted correctly: 1) make a contribution to this campaign and when you receive your confirmation, note the "spread the word" url that Indiegogo provides. Insert this url into the emails you send to friends. When they click through and contribute to this campaign, your referral tally will increase.  OR 2) create an Indiegogo account for yourself (free), then use the "Share" tools on this campaign page located just below the video.
The referral contest winner will be announced by The Mitney Project on this campaign page, on Mitney's Facebook page and on Mitney's website www.themitneyproject.org on July 23. The winner will be notified directly by Mitney via email on the same day. Good luck, and thank you for helping to build an opportunity center for a great community!

story:
Raising $33,333.33 as initial funding for a community space for the Australian Entheogenic community and as a space where people in Victoria can LEGALLY experience journeys into the Divine Consciousness using Transcendent Compounds.


This is an audacious event that, if successful will change the status of Transcendent Compounds within Australia and perhaps even around the world! It will bring the community of users into the perceptions of the mainstream community in a positive way. *Transcendent Compounds are those Entheogens that are non-addictive, non-toxic and psychologically safe in an appropriate dose, set and setting. The term is important, both for legal reasons and because it does what it says on the label.

 

The Detail

The money will be used to rent a shopfront that can be used as a community space. This space will aim to provide several things both to the Entheogenic and broader community generally.

1. It will be a space where people who use Transcendent Compounds can gather and meet like minded people and where new people can find entry into our wonderful community. It will be a place from which we can visibly launch our healing work into the community and demonstrate to the general population that we are a valuable addition to society and not a menace.

2. Many people in society exist in a state of existential crisis. There is simply nowhere for them to go if they wish to discuss issues of meaning, purpose and existence, without having someone's dogma forced down their throats. This will provide such a location. It will be a space where anybody can come to discuss and explore meaning of life issues, such as purpose, destiny and metaphysics. Hopefully we can create a philosophical wonderland. Discussion will be governed by the "Principles" on which Community of Infinite Colour is founded. The first of these is that The TRUTH is not out there, or as Socrates put it "all I know is that I know nothing". Each person needs to figure life and meaning out for themselves and Community is about building a society where gurus and dogmas are obsolete and the recognition is that "The First Disciple is always the First Heretic". Discussions become discussions among equals where everyone commits to being both teacher and student (and yes, I admit I do sometimes have difficulty with the latter!).
The philosophy is based on an intersection of Philosophical Rationalism, Scientific Rationalism and Mysticism.


3. It will be a space where people who are experiencing difficulties in their lives can receive pastoral care and an escape from isolation. This care will be provided by Greg Kasarik and volunteers. Greg is a trained and experienced counsellor, who has been unable to find work in this area due to his drug law reform work. This will provide the perfect space for him to put his talents to use and allow him to do what he is best at: Helping people.

4. Anyone who has been following Greg Kasarik's activities for the last three years will know that he has a nearly watertight legal argument to the effect that Transcendent Compounds are legal within the state of Victoria for spiritual and religious purposes!

Community of Infinite Colour is a spiritual organisation that meets the legal criteria for "religion" under Australian Law. (Pending further legal advice, it will be kept unincorporated, thereby ensuring that Greg Kasarik's bears sole legal responsibility for all of its activities). Community will be providing the opportunity for ordinary folk to use Transcendent Compounds within spiritual frameworks. Initially, this will be quite limited and symbolic, so as to give the Victorian Government time to adjust and so that if any arrests are made not too many people are caught up in it.

 

Legal Implications

While it is not the main purpose of the space, the existence of an an actual spiritual organisation, Community of Infinite Colour, will force the Government to accept our validity as a spiritual community and abide by the provisions of Section 14 and Section 7 of The Victorian Charter of Human Rights and Responsibilities Act (2006). Of course, they could arrest us and drag us through the High Court of Australia, where they will inevitably lose: We will pack the court with so much science and so many expert witnesses that they will rue the day they ever sought to demonise and persecute such ancient and wise teachers as the Sacred Plants.Finally, they could alter the wording of the Charter to remove our rights, but in doing so they would be admitting that their position is based purely on bigotry and ignorance, rather than the decades of science that I have thus far used to avoid arrest.

The Victorian Parliament knows they do not have a leg to stand on with this. I have publically tripped three times on the steps of parliament without being bothered. I have twice gone into a police station, told them about my use of sacred compounds and invited them to arrest me. On both times I walked free.

It is my goal to force this issue this year, so that by 2014, everyone in Victoria (and by extension the Australian Capital Territory, because the Victorian act is based on theirs) has the legally recognised right to use Transcendent Compounds as part of their spiritual practice.

This will not mean that your activities must go through Community of Infinite Colour to be legal. Both the Victorian and ACT acts give you the right to practice your religion (legal term) as an individual, if you choose.

 

What We Need

$33,333.33 is about a third of what we expect to need in order to get this project up and running.
Depending on location and size, a shopfront can be expected to cost between $25,000 to $60,000 per year, plus outgoings such as heating, rates and other expenses. Obviously, we'll be looking at starting small! :-)

Additional expenses can be expected with respect to planning permits to the local council, as this will be considered a "Place of Assembly".Should enough funds be raised, additional moneys will be used to provide Greg Kasarik with a living wage, so that he can be present at the location on a full time basis. Until that time, the opening hours will be based entirely on volunteer availability, although weekend opening is a priority.

Additional legal expenses may be incurred should the Government seek to challenge us in the courts, but these funds will not be used for that purpose.

Should the full funds not be raised, those funds that are raised will go towards some sort of Community Space, even if it is only a house in a residential street.

Plese note, that at the outset, there are almost no "Rewards" for contributing above a certain amount, although we are in the process of putting together a series of stickers and posters as rewards, the artwork for these is not yet available.

We looked into a variety of sacred plants, seeds and cuttings and free participation in Ayahuasca and Mushroom circles for higher amounts, but decided against this because this might be percieved as being against the Indigogo Terms and Conditions. There is already a good chance that this event will be prematurely closed, so there is nothing to be gained from adding more fuel to the fire. 

Frankly, if you need a "gift" to donate to a project such as this, we haven't quite gotten through to you...

 

 
The Impact - A Personal Message from Greg Kasarik.

This needs to be done!

We don't have official figures, but guess that those using of Transcendent Compounds (AKA Entheogens) for Spiritual purposes form the largest growing spiritual community in many parts of the world, including Australia.

Despite this, I regularly encounter two things when speaking with members of the Entheogenic Community. Whenever I speak to people, they cry out for the need for a space that they can call their own; where they can meet and exchange ideas with those on a similar journey. They feel the isolation of being a silent and misunderstood minority.

The second thing I regularly encounter is fear. I experience it myself (as I type this, I feel it sitting like a lump of dead coal in my chest) and it robs far too many of us of our vitality. We hide who we are and we lie to those we love, for fear of losing our families, jobs, friends and loved ones. If we are to ever thrive as a community and as individuals, we need to throw off the chains that bind us and make the firm decision that we, as a community, are going to be the authors of our own destinies.

The legal argument is as solid as it is ever going to be. If we don't act now, we risk missing out on the opportunity of a lifetime. There is now a critical mass for change within the Entheogenic Community. Entheogenesis Australis (EGA), who so courageously led the way are now more than a decade old. Each year sees a profusion of books and research and a greater profusion of evidence that our path is not only safe and sacred, but highly beneficial to those with the courage to make the journey.

I fully acknowledge that this action will produce a backlash amongst the more fanatical and intolerant members of our society. But this backlash is coming one way, or another. In a decade EGA went from a handful of people in a community room in Nunawadding to nearly seven hundred at a four day outdoor conference in the Strathbogie Ranges in 2011. With this kind of growth it will only be a few more years before we are noticed and fall victim to the hatreds of bigotry and ignorance. I firmly believe that our best hope lies in taking the initiative and demonstrating to our fellow citizens that we are not "druggies", but are instead worthwhile and contributing members of society.

Solid support will make it clear to the politicians that we are a genuine community and not to be taken lightly.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that’s all there is to it.

story: Hello, my name is Julia. I'm a single, struggling mother who desperately needs help. I was working full time as a medical biller, part time acting, college full time double majoring in Criminal Justice and Real Estate, as well as organizing rallies-then I got into a car accident. My car was totaled. Since then our life has gotten worse and worse. I lost my job, had to withdraw from classes, got evicted, and have tried with every ounce of my heart and might to survive since then. I am the first one in my family to graduate from high school, get college educated and make something of myself. I was raised in the motels of Orange County, Ca. and was forced to do unimaginable things to make sure my mother was taken care of. I decided finally that I would change my life, I was determined to make a life that  was honorable. My goals in life are to help others, show a good example to my son, and live successfully so he never has to live through the struggles and pain I've been through. My situation of not having a car has had a detrimental effect on our lives and my pursuit to give JP the life he deserves with no stress. We are currently sleeping on the floor in a tiny apartment we managed to get into, and there is no nearby public transportation. If I can buy a vehicle, that will give us the foot up we need to get things moving forward and back in order. I've looked into organizations and tried contacting family too, but they all struggle too so they can't help others. This is our last hope.

story:
Hello All,

I would like to share the story of my friend, Francis. I met Francis this past summer in Royal Oak. I found it very odd for an elderly woman to be sitting in the back of a Coney Island at 1am, so I asked her if she needed help. I ended up sitting and talking with her for hours, and this went on for many weekends.

Francis is 77 years-old, and homeless. She was abandoned by family members and left to fend for herself. She has tried to stay at homeless shelters, but most make her leave after a few days since she is unable to work because of her age. Hearing her story was heartbreaking- I cannot imagine letting a family member of mine go without shelter or food. The other night, she slept on a park bench- it was 27 degrees. She goes days without sleeping because she does not want to be outside. All of her belongings belong in one plastic bag, because she cannot carry the weight of anything else.

Although her story is heart breaking, her spirit is remarkable. Francis always has a smile on her face and always has a positive attitude. I asked Francis how she stays so positive, and she simply told me "I've learned to let go of the things I can't control and be happy, no matter the circumstance." She will talk and listen to anyone. She speaks kindly of the world that has been unfair to her in old age. She quickly became my friend. We have shared many laughs, and many burgers (her favorite).

Francis deserves to have a great Christmas. She never asks for a dime from anyone, but instead asks others if they need help or cheering up. I would like to raise $500 to buy gift cards to some of the food places she resides (McDonald's, Leo's Coney Island, more Royal Oak spots). I want her to have the simple freedom of eating or having a hot beverage whenever she wants.

I know money can be tight around the holidays- but I ask you to please help this incredible woman this Christmas. Even if it's just $5, every bit counts.

Thank you all, and Happy Holidays!

story:
Fund the Fun: Camp Cedar Cliff's 2014 Scholarship Campaign


We believe that a week at Camp Cedar Cliff can change lives. We believe every child should have the opportunity to experience the spiritual and social benefits as well as the fun of camp. Will you join us as we create opportunities for each and every camper to attend camp?

Last year, we raised nearly $20,000 which was generously matched, providing 90 campers with a week of camp! This year we want to provide at least 150 scholarships for campers. But we need your help to do that! 

Giving to the online campaign is just one way you can Fund the Fun.

The Facts 

When you donate through Indiegogo, you’ll be part of a larger fundraising effort that will continue throughout the year. We have until January 20th to scholarship at least FIVE campers through the first online campaign. We get to keep ALL of what we raise no matter if we reach or exceed our goal. Indiegogo charges a 4% fee on the amount raised, but this is the lowest fee of the sites like this. Check out the quick facts to see how the funds are used. 

o  The tuition of a week of residential camp is $720. This covers program fees, food, lodging, and staff salary. 

o  Families apply for scholarship through a simple process and every applicant is awarded something.

o  Last year we gave an average of $525 per scholarship. The amount is determined based on need.

o  The family or often a church will cover the remaining balance ($120 tuition+$75 registration fee).

o  Using the average scholarship amount and allowing for the 4% fee:

     If we raise $2,730 online that’s enough to send FIVE campers to camp

     If we raise $4,375 online that’s enough to send EIGHT campers to camp

     If we raise $6,562 online that’s enough to send TWELVE campers to camp

     If 110 people give $25, we’ll EXCEED our goal of $2,730 and FIVE campers

The Impact

“I feel this has turned my son’s life around in the right direction and for that I thank you…He wouldn’t have been able to go if there weren’t a scholarship program.”

–2013 scholarship recipient parent

Like you heard on last year’s video, Camp Cedar Cliff is a life-shaping, incredible way to strengthen a child’s relationship with Christ. Camp often introduces kids to what it means to know God.  Sometimes counselors’ extra attention and confidence that your camper can succeed is all a camper needs to build their own confidence. Will you be a part of shaping kid’s lives?

Next Steps

o  Attend the Scholarship Dinner on December 5th. Call the camp office for more details: 828.450.3331

o  Pray for us! We can’t do what we do without the support of our communities and continued prayer for our team and for the kids who will come during the summer. You are a valuable part of our ministry!

                          Thanks for partnering with the Camp Cedar Cliff Team!

story:
Below is an exerpt from my business plan - it describes what I would like to achieve. Because it's a professional buisness plan, it's a little bit "jargon-y" but keep in mind my main goal: Brining you beautiful, custom, yummy cakes, and, making your weekly dinner preperations healthier and easier.

"Ready to Cook is a unique business venture for the North Bay region of Ontario.  The company will offer professional-grade kitchen facilities, menus, ingredients and materials for meal assembly and home storage, thus providing the benefits of convenience, peace of mind and price value for clients.  Ready to Cook is a division of a successful cake design company, The Cake Mistress.  Both companies are founded by entrepreneur, Shelley Batenchuk, pictured above.

Ready to Cook is the first to market in the region.  Similar companies exist throughout Canada, and are proven to be highly successful and profitable.  Ready to Cook targets busy families and individuals looking for fast, easy and inexpensive ways to fix and prepare meals without sacrificing the health value. 

Ready to Cook will form strategic alliances with various local producers and fresh produce grocers for ingredients.  For low-cost methods of finding employment assistance, Ready to Cook will form strategic alliances with the local colleges and universities to offer internships, co-ops and summer work-for-credit options for culinary students. 

In addition, Ready to Cook will collaborate with local Aboriginal and First Nations Groups to offer workshops, employment opportunities and special events that highlight the richness of their culture and heritage.

Initial financial projections show that Ready to Cook is a promising venture, given Shelley Batenchuk’s professional and academic background, her experience, her determination and drive to succeed, and the unmet need for a facility such as Ready to Cook in the area.

In addition, the combination of Ready to Cook with The Cake Mistress gives the facility a unique competitive advantage of not only being first to market, but the only one of its kind to have a custom bake shop associated with it.  This business is sure to stand out.

It is estimated that Ready to Cook will need $110,400 financial assistance to support the demand for a facility that provides residents of North Bay and surrounding communities a healthful, culturally diverse, hand-prepared, satisfying meals for a reasonable price."

What I Need & What You Get

Im trying to raise a minimum of $20,000, to be used to cover what I may not receive in grant funding. This is a flexible funding campaign, so I elected for all of it to go directly to the venture, however, if there is not a sufficient amount raised, I will return the contributions (but a lesser %age is collected by IndieGogo if we meet this goal).

Here is more about my project:

Ready to Cook is a newly-formed division of an existing home-based cake design company, The Cake Mistress.  Shelley Batenchuk is the founder and sole proprietor of the company.  

Ready to Cook is a food service kitchen site that provides busy parents and professionals with a professional-grade kitchen for meal assembly.  As an alternative, Ready to Cook also provides the service of assembling meals for clients, thus taking all the hassle out of planning, preparing and assembling meals. 

The customer comes into the Ready to Cook facility and selects a meal from the menu.  Upon meal selection, the customer is led to a prep station, whereupon he or she assembles the meal per the provided instructions.  All raw ingredients are prepared (sliced, diced, grated, etc.) and arranged in proper food preparation stations akin to a restaurant salad bar.  Meats and other refrigerated ingredients are stored safely and in pre-measured portions in proper refrigerators.

The customer has a variety of ingredients to choose from to accommodate for dietary restrictions and taste preferences.  A wide range of alternatives are offered for customization of the meal.  After assembly, the meal is packaged for the customer to safely transport and store at home.

The Cake Mistress is a 3-year old existing home-based business founded by Shelley Batenchuk as well.  The Cake Mistress will be sharing facilities with Ready to Cook.  This shared facility allows for Shelley to manage and operate both businesses simultaneously while providing a facility that offers customers a comprehensive solution to the drudgery of meal planning and preparation. 

As well, the facility will have a kid-zone designed for children of varying age groups toeither help with meal prep/baking or play while their parents assemble the meal." 

I have already applied for a buisness start-up grant, but the approval is based on being able to match some of the funds that I am asking for.

With this being said - any funds generated by this campaign will go directly to funding the project, purchasing equipment, leasing a commercial unit. If a commercial facility is not available at the time the campaign closes, I will use the funds generated to upgrade my current location, and equipment.

If your total contributions generate less than $2000, I will return all contributions.

story:
“CAPPUCCIO”….. the philosophy


“Cappuccio” is a life plan, a working and cultural ideal.
The aim of our project is to create a task that allows people living well: “work to live”, and not “live for working”.

The task is very difficult to achieve, especially if you are more than 50 years old and you live in Italy, but the expectation is to reach our dream in Denmark.

“Cappuccio” is a cultural plan especially for Italian people who like eating good food and drinking coffee and cappuccino: for them, that represents special moments of the day.
It represents culture, flair, art, pleasure, love and history. It is a big and an important treasure that people are loosing and that we want to save. Maybe we can do this bringing and introducing our “eat and drink” culture out of Italy.

The plan represents culture because we would like to let our clients testing the flavour of good food, offering them music, art and literature, all related to the rites of good food.

“Cappuccio” is also a life plan, cause we believe that our clients are special and we love the fact that they will have the chance to taste and smell “the pleasure of life”.



“CAPPUCCIO”…. the menu

Our menu is written in your mind and in your body, and we want to learn reading and listening to it.
The main ingredient will be the “Time”, that slowly accompain you in your future choices, through different types of coffee, milk, cappuccino, milk with coffee, tea and herbal teas, that can be tasted alone or with desserts coming from the Italian tradition. We won’t offer full meals, but moments of meditation in order to achieve a good start of the day.
Breakfast time, but also eating snacks before dinner, together with a quiet and relaxing atmosphere will be the main subjects of the day, even because they represent the most important moments to nourish the soul.
For this reason tables are equipped with wireless headphones and touch-pad, so that clients will be able to choose the menu they prefer.
All ingredients are organic and exclusively purchased in the fair-trade.

story:
I am so excited about DOOGDO! I could shout it from the rooftops. DOODGO will be a new type of intention-circle site without any of the baggage that so many traditionally religious prayer sites carry. Anyone who believes in holding good intentions for one another will be welcome. Ask for a DOOGDO for any cause, wait for someone to accept your request and hopefully get a viral chain of people holding an intention for you. It will be fun, supportive and welcoming. Everyone is welcome to join in: Christians, Muslims, Jews, non-believers, all races, creeds, genders and sexual orientation. The only people not welcome on DOOGDO are haters! I CAN tell you that it will be full of inspiration but will be hip and fun. It is about positive change and it will take off! We already have backers asking about it. And YOU will be a part of something big, on the ground floor of change. 

Let's stop acting like bullies and haters and start talking to each other...in a positive, compassionate way. The site will encourage that--in fact it demands it of the user. 

Your positive dollars will essentially go to web development, design for functionality, and to press and PR campaigns. And then you will have been the seedling for change in the world.

story:
UPDATE Sept 6
After working on this project for a year while holding down a full time job, going back to school & reading all about how successful crowdfunding is for worthy projects, I am dismayed that I barely raised $155 (from people I knew-who will have their money refunded) at this point. In order to have the playhouses produced I really need a minimum $6500 to get started. I thought this was the place to do that. Even after lowering the price of the perk to only include the organic food truck, there are still no takers and no donations.

With regret, I'm shutting this campaign down. Oops, no, I can't do that.  So, I've removed all the perks except for one...the Air Hug priced at $1. If 6500 of you believe like I do, that we can greatly lower future incidents of type 2 diabetes, heart disease, obesity, etc in children as they grow, by teaching them about healthy food choices and what is in their food through play, then you know what to do.

If 6500 of you donate $1 each to start the presses, I'll reintroduce the Organic Food Truck perk at the $75 level and get the orders filled in time for Christmas.

I'll still be at the SF Green Festival in Nov with the prototypes so if you are in the N Cal area, you can bring your kids to play Organic Food Truck! I'll also be set up at the Petaluma Palooza in a couple of weeks.

In the meantime, I'm going to go looking for funding from traditional sources and maybe a partner.

Best to all,
Charles Parker
Creator Happy's Greenhouse Play & Learning Toys
